title: Where and How to Get Jangmo‐o in Pokémon Sun and Moon

steps.title: Traverse through Poni Canyon, until you get near the end of it.
steps.content: Traverse through Poni Canyon, until you get near the end of it.

steps.title: Crawl under it, and there is a small chance that a Jangmo-o will appear.
steps.content: Crawl under it, and there is a small chance that a Jangmo-o will appear. While this method is difficult, one advantage of it is that past the tree is a small pond where you can find TM35.

steps.title: Look out for a patch of grass.
steps.content: Look out for a patch of grass. Once you are almost done with Poni Canyon, you will see a small patch of grass near the trial site. In this patch, you have a 5% chance to find a Jangmo-o.

steps.title: Boost your chances if you can.
steps.content: Boost your chances if you can. Your chances can be boosted by having a Pokémon with the move Sweet Scent in your party, or an ability that increases encounters with wild Pokémon.
